Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Promiscuity \Pro`mis*cu"i*ty\, n. Promiscuousness; confusion. --H. Spencer. [1913 Webster]
promiscuity n : indulging in promiscuous (casual and indiscriminate) sexual relations [syn: {promiscuousness}, {sleeping around}]
